name: kubectl_delete
description: Delete Kubernetes resources by resource type, name, labels, or from a manifest file

resourceType.description: Type of resource to delete (e.g., pods, deployments, services, etc.)

name.description: Name of the resource to delete

namespace.description: Namespace of the resource (optional - defaults to 'default' for namespaced resources)

labelSelector.description: Delete resources matching this label selector (e.g. 'app=nginx')

manifest.description: YAML manifest defining resources to delete (optional)

filename.description: Path to a YAML file to delete resources from (optional)

allNamespaces.description: If true, delete resources across all namespaces

force.description: If true, immediately remove resources from API and bypass graceful deletion

gracePeriodSeconds.description: Period of time in seconds given to the resource to terminate gracefully
